short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Delete All Messages from Facebook Messenger in one click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An extension to quickly clean up your account
Our extension will help you clear not only messages, but also photos, friends, videos, feed and more.

Recent Changes:
1. The extension has been corrected to take into account recent changes in Facebook.
2. Added the ability to delete not only dialogs but also unsubscribe from groups.
3. Added quick feedback.
